com.coolhandsoftware.trailtrace

Class RouteDrawFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.coolhandsoftware.trailtrace.RouteDrawFragment

  • public class RouteDrawFragment
extends Fragment
    This fragment allows the user to trace a raw route on the screen. It reports coordinates traced to whomever is registered as its receiver via the IRouteDrawReceiver interface.
    Author:
    David Cully david.a.cully@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IRouteDrawReceiver mReceiver
      the recipient of callbacks
      private RouteDrawView mRouteDrawView
      the view which allows for tracing

      • drawRouteFromPixels

        public void drawRouteFromPixels(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<<any>>> storedLineSegments)
        Draws route onto the screen from pairs of pixel coordinates. Used to refresh trace state from elsewhere.
        Parameters:
        storedLineSegments - the list of list of points to be stored - each inner list is a segment

      • clearTracedRoute

        public void clearTracedRoute()
        Erases what's drawn on the screen.

      • registerAsRouteDrawReceiver

        public void registerAsRouteDrawReceiver(IRouteDrawReceiver receiver)
        Allows caller to register to receive updates from RouteDrawView upon draw events via an interface.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the object implementing the IRouteDrawReceiver interface

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Determines size for arrow based on activity's size on the screen.
